title: FaSta-Station_Facilities_Status
description:
A RESTful webservice to retrieve data about the operational state of public elevators and escalators in german railway stations operated by DB Station&Service AG. 
Note: Production and sandbox environments use the same production backend server.

disruption.description: A disruption contains information associated with a facility that is temporarily not available.

description.description: The local conditions of the related facility.

furtherDescription.description: Further information of the cause if available.

lastUpdate.description: Last time this disruption has been updated (formatted in ISO-1806).

outOfServiceOn.description: Time specification when the facility will not be available for planned maintenance work (formatted in ISO-1806).

outOfServiceTo.description: Time specification when the facility will be available again after planned maintenance work (formatted in ISO-1806).

plannedCompletion.description: Time specification when the repair is planned to be finished (formatted in ISO-1806).

stationnumber.description: Station number of the related facility.

type.description: The type of the related facility e.g. escalator or elevator.

facility.description: Currently a facility provided by this API is either a public elevator or escalator in a german railway station operated by Station&Service AG.

description.description: The local conditions of the facility.

geocoordX.description: longitude component of geocoordinate in WGS84 format

geocoordY.description: latitude component of geocoordinate in WGS84 format

stationnumber.description: Number of the station where the facility is located.

type.description: Facility type. Currently elevator or escalator.

point.description: Representation of a geographical point in GeoJSON format

coordinates.description: An array of numbers. First value is longitude, second latitude.

stationnumber.description: Unique identifier of the railway station.

actions.title: findDisruptions
actions.description: Returns information about disruptions of facilities filtered by parameters.

type.description: type of the facility to filter by

equipmentnumber.description: equipmentnumber of the facility to fetch

stationnumber.description: stationnumber of the station to fetch

actions.title: findDisruptionByDisruptionNumber
actions.description: Returns information about a specific disruption of a facility

disruptionnumber.description: disruptionnumber of the disruption to fetch

actions.title: findFacilities
actions.description: Access to public facilities (escalators and elevators) in railway stations

type.description: type of the facility to filter by

state.description: the state of the facility to filter by

equipmentnumbers.description: equipmentnumbers of the facility to filter by

area.description: Geo coordinate rectangle in WGS84-format to filter by. Parameters must be 4 numbers exactly as follows: longitudeWest, latitudeSouth, longitudeEast, latitudeNorth.

actions.title: getFacilityByEquipmentNumber
actions.description: Returns the facility identified by its equipmentnumber

equipmentnumber.description: equipmentnumber of the facility to fetch

actions.title: findStationByStationNumber
actions.description: Returns information about the station and its facilities identified by a stationnumber.

stationnumber.description: stationnumber of the station to fetch
